urls.description: Hundreds of homes and properties will be better protected from flooding after a £3.8million flood alleviation scheme was announced for Worksop.

text:
A £3.8 million #floodprevention scheme has been announced for an area in Nottinghamshire as part of the @EnvAgency annual capital programme. 

Over six years, work will be done to protect 250 homes in Worksop that experienced widespread flooding in 2019.
